meanings.definition: To combine genetic material from different sources to produce a new genetic combination.
meanings.sent1: Scientists recombs DNA to create new organisms.
meanings.sent2: She recombs different flower species to make unique hybrids.
meanings.sent3: The mad scientist accidentally recombs the wrong genes, creating a glowing fish.
meanings.sent4: In the lab, researchers recombs genetic material like artists mixing colors on a palette.
meanings.sent5: The process of recombs can lead to exciting discoveries in biology.
